trans-unit.source: Represents a single user interface (UI) entity managed by an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma única entidade de interface do usuário gerenciada por um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" />.

trans-unit.source: The sole purpose of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> is to paint and hit test.
trans-unit.target: O único propósito de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> é para pintura e teste de clique.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> does not have a window handle (HWND), as it is rendered on the adorner window control of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> não tem um identificador de janela (HWND), como ele é renderizado no controle de janela de adorno do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> can have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> pode ter um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> associados a ele.

trans-unit.source: A successfully hit-tested <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> has the opportunity to push a new or different <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> onto the behavior stack of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Um testada com êxito ocorrências- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> tem a oportunidade de enviar um novo ou diferente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> para a pilha de comportamento do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Behavior Service Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [visão geral do serviço de comportamento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f).

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create your own <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> based class with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> associated with it.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como criar seu próprio <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> com base em classe com <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> associados a ele.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: Can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como inicializar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> classe.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />, or <see langword="null" /> if there is no behavior.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> associados a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />, ou <see langword="null" /> se não houver nenhum comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounds of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os limites do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> representing the bounds of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa os limites do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.Bounds%2A> to create a glyph with the specific dimensions and position.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.Bounds%2A> para criar um glifo com dimensões específicas e posição.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classe.

trans-unit.source: A point to hit-test.
trans-unit.target: Um ponto no qual realizar teste de clique.

trans-unit.source: Provides hit test logic.
trans-unit.target: Fornece lógica de teste de clique.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> is associated with <paramref name="p" />; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> for associado a <paramref name="p" />; caso contrário, <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.GetHitTest%2A> method is an `abstract` method that forces <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> implementations to provide hit test logic.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.GetHitTest%2A> método é um `abstract` método força <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> implementações para fornecer lógica de teste de clique.

trans-unit.source: Given any point, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> has decided to be involved with that location, it will need to return a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor>.
trans-unit.target: Dada a qualquer momento, se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> decidiu envolvido com que local, ele deverá retornar um válido <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, returning `null` will cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> to ignore the location.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, retornando `null` fará com que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> para ignorar o local.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.GetHitTest%2A> to see if the point is within this glyph.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.GetHitTest%2A> para ver se o ponto está dentro este glifo.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classe.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Provides paint logic.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a lógica de pintura.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.Paint%2A> method is an `abstract` method that forces <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> implementations to provide paint logic.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.Paint%2A> método é um `abstract` método força <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> implementações para fornecer lógica de pintura.

trans-unit.source: The `pe` parameter contains the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> related to the adorner window of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: O `pe` parâmetro contém o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> relacionadas à janela de adorno do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.Paint%2A> to draw a glyph.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.Paint%2A> para desenhar um glifo.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classe.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> to associate with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> a ser associado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: Changes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: Altera o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.SetBehavior(System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior)" /> method is called by inheriting classes to change the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.SetBehavior(System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior)" /> método é chamado por herança de classes para alterar o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> associado a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
